Package com.example.project_seekdeep

Class Mood

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_seekdeep.Mood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Mood extends Object implements Serializable
This is a class that represents every mood post the user creates.

  • Constructor Details

    • Mood

      public Mood(UserProfile owner, EmotionalStates emotionalState)
      This method is a constructor for Mood which takes a User and emotionalState. This method also sets the date to the current date
      Parameters:
      owner - New user which owns this mood
      emotionalState - New String for emotionalState

    • Mood

      public Mood(UserProfile owner, EmotionalStates emotionalState, SocialSituations socialSituation, String trigger)
      Parameters:
      owner - owner of the damn mood
      emotionalState - New EmotionalState for emotionalState
      socialSituation - New SocialSituation for socialSituation
      trigger - New String for trigger of the situation

    • Mood

      public Mood(UserProfile owner, EmotionalStates emotionalState, String[] stringFields)
      This is a constructor for Mood.
      Parameters:
      owner - The user that posted the mood event (UserProfile)
      emotionalState - The emotional state of the user/mood event (EmotionalState)
      stringFields - A string array in the form [trigger, reason, social situation] (String[])

    • Mood

      public Mood(UserProfile owner, EmotionalStates emotionalState, SocialSituations socialSituation, String trigger, List<String> followers, Date postedDate)
      This is constructor for Mood
      Parameters:
      owner - The user that posted the mood event (UserProfile)
      emotionalState - The emotional state of the user/mood event (EmotionalState)
      socialSituation - The social situation of the user/mood event (SocialSituation)
      trigger - The string that describes a trigger the user experienced for the mood
      followers - A list of strings that correspond with the users that are
      postedDate - A Date that corresponds with when the mood was created/posted

    • Mood

      public Mood(UserProfile owner, EmotionalStates emotionalState, SocialSituations socialSituation, String trigger, List<String> followers, Date postedDate, String reason)
      This is constructor for Mood
      Parameters:
      owner - The user that posted the mood event (UserProfile)
      emotionalState - The emotional state of the user/mood event (EmotionalState)
      socialSituation - The social situation of the user/mood event (SocialSituation)
      trigger - The string that describes a trigger the user experienced for the mood
      followers - A list of strings that correspond with the users that are
      postedDate - A Date that corresponds with when the mood was created/posted
      reason - the reason with mood

    • Mood

      public Mood(EmotionalStates emotionalState, List<String> followers, UserProfile owner, Date postedDate, SocialSituations socialSituation, String trigger)

      emotionalState - The emotional state of the user/mood event (EmotionalState)
      followers - A list of strings that correspond with the users that are
      owner - The user that posted the mood event (UserProfile)
      postedDate - A Date that corresponds with when the mood was created/posted
      socialSituation - The social situation of the user/mood event (SocialSituation)
